mapper.update: update tbl_dept set deptno = #{deptno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager = #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderId = #{orderid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, timestamp = #{timestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, deptno, name, manager, description, phone, orderId, timestamp, status from tbl_dept
